Integrated Management System (IMS) Policy

 

Pura Solutionsâ€™ Integrated Management System (IMS) Policy is aligned with our strategic objective to responsibly innovate in the biomedical field with the integration of the artificial intelligence into software as medical devices (SaMD). This policy establishes a unified framework that incorporates the requirements of ISO/IEC 42001 (AI Management), ISO/IEC 27001 (Information Security), ISO 13485 (Medical Device Quality), and ISO 14971 (Risk Management for Medical Devices), guiding our processes from design to delivery.

We are committed to meeting the expectations of our customers, patients, partners, and regulatory authorities through the following principles:

 

 

 

 

As the CEO of Pura Solutions, I am personally committed to ensuring the provision of necessary human, technical, and financial resources while fostering responsibility, communication, and ethical conduct across all levels of the organization. Regular management reviews will be conducted to assess the effectiveness and compliance of the IMS and to guide strategic improvements.

This policy is reviewed periodically by top management, communicated to all relevant personnel, and made available to interested parties upon request. All team members are expected to actively support the implementation and continual improvement of the IMS to ensure stakeholder satisfaction and full compliance with applicable legal, regulatory, and normative requirements governing AI and medical device software.
